channel.title: Mod please delte problem fixed!
channel.description:
well i am coming to an end on my server and decided to add a ::pure for more pkers at a certain lvl... but it turns out people jsut mass the ::pure so that they can get lvl 126 easier.. well this is pretty much what they are doing
[client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure [client-51-Holy spec]: command: pure
can someone help me add a limit to 1 ::pure?

item.title: Mod please delte problem fixed!
item.dc:creator: @o0_pwn3d_00 o0 pwn3d 00

lol derr im nto stupid i did that but its jsut not blocking the 2nd ::pure and still lets u level

item.title: Mod please delte problem fixed!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Add -

public int pure = 0;

somewhere in your player class with your other ints.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod please delte problem fixed!

item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:7, topic:263109”][quote author=demon 2242 link=topic=347547.msg2675638#msg2675638 date=1235060409]

} else if (pure == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to do ::pure again!! :p");

[/quote] this is correct and you should take this into consideration.

That’s exactly what I put into my command…[/quote]

same here, and i posted befor you all.

item.title: Mod please delte problem fixed!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

This would be the code -

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND NAME")) { if (pure == 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("MESSAGE"); pure = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (pure == 1) { sendMessage("MESSAGE"); } }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (pure == 0) {
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);

savemoreinfo();
savechar();

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to do ::pure again!! :p");

        }
    }[/code]
